an4.10:4.3: The attachment to sensual pleasures, future lives, views, and ignorance.
an4.10:4.4: And what is the attachment to sensual pleasures?
an4.10:4.5: It’s when you don’t truly understand sensual pleasures’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
an4.10:4.6: So greed, relishing, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for sensual pleasures linger on inside.
an4.10:4.7: This is called the attachment to sensual pleasures.
an4.10:4.8: Such is the attachment to sensual pleasures.
an4.10:5.1: And what is the attachment to future lives?
an4.10:5.2: It’s when you don’t truly understand future lives’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
an4.10:5.3: So lust, delight, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving to be reborn linger on inside.
an4.10:5.4: This is called the attachment to future lives.
an4.10:5.5: Such are the attachments to sensual pleasures and future lives.
an4.10:6.1: And what is the attachment to views?
an4.10:6.2: It’s when you don’t truly understand view’s origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
an4.10:6.3: So lust, delight, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for views linger on inside.
an4.10:6.4: This is called the attachment to views.
an4.10:6.5: Such are the attachment to sensual pleasures, future lives, and views.
an4.10:7.1: And what is the attachment to ignorance?
an4.10:7.2: It’s when you don’t truly understand the six fields of contact’s origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape,
an4.10:7.3: so ignorance and unknowing of the six fields of contact linger on inside.
an4.10:7.4: This is called the attachment to ignorance.
an4.10:7.5: Such are the attachments to sensual pleasures, future lives, views, and ignorance. Someone attached to bad, unwholesome qualities—corruptions that lead to future lives and are hurtful, resulting in suffering and future birth, old age, and death—
an4.10:7.6: is called: ‘one who has not found sanctuary from attachments’.
an4.10:8.1: There are these four kinds of detachment.
an4.10:8.3: Detachment from sensual pleasure, future lives, views, and ignorance.
an4.10:8.4: And what is detachment from sensual pleasures?
an4.10:8.5: It’s when you truly understand sensual pleasures’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
an4.10:8.6: So greed, relishing, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for sensual pleasures don’t linger on inside.
an4.10:8.7: This is called detachment from sensual pleasures.
an4.10:8.8: Such is detachment from sensual pleasures.

an4.10:9.3: So lust, delight, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving to be reborn don’t linger on inside.
an4.10:9.4: This is called detachment from future lives.
an4.10:9.5: Such is detachment from sensual pleasures and future lives.
an4.10:10.1: And what is detachment from views?
an4.10:10.2: It’s when you don’t truly understand views’ origin, ending, gratification, drawback, and escape.
an4.10:10.3: So lust, delight, affection, stupefaction, thirst, passion, attachment, and craving for views linger on inside.
an4.10:10.4: This is called detachment from views.
an4.10:10.5: Such is detachment from sensual pleasures, future lives, and views.
